alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:56PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Coffee and northwestern Geneva Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 1256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Samson, or 13 miles southwest of Enterprise, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Samson, Kinston, Earlytown, Hacoda, Spears, Pera, Weeks, Sellersville, Lucile, Turner Crossroads, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Goodman, Ganer, Holley Store, Enterprise Municipal A/P, Lowery and Marvin Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
